summary: WHILE DRIVING AND WITHOUT WARNING A LOUD CLINKING NOISE CAN BE HEARD.  THE DEALER IS AWARE OF THE PROBLEM.  *NLM  SQUEELING NOISE FROM MOTOR.  TRANSMISSION LURCHED AND WOULD NOT ENGAGE.  TRANSMISSION AND TRANSFER CASE HAD TO BE FLUSHED.  REPLACE STEERING SHAFT FOR CLINKING NOISE.  CLOCKSPRING REPLACED.
